expectedFeatures.title: Daily Updated Exchange Rates (WIP)
expectedFeatures.description: Get the most current exchange rates updated daily from the European Central Bank.

expectedFeatures.title: 30 Major World Currencies (WIP)
expectedFeatures.description: Convert between all major world currencies including USD, EUR, GBP, JPY, and other ECB-tracked currencies.

expectedFeatures.title: Instant Conversion (WIP)
expectedFeatures.description: Lightning-fast currency calculations with swap functionality and popular conversion shortcuts.

expectedFeatures.title: Exchange Rate History (WIP)
expectedFeatures.description: View detailed exchange rate tables and track currency trends with our comprehensive data display.

expectedFeatures.title: Interactive Currency Graphs (WIP)
expectedFeatures.description: Visualize currency trends with beautiful interactive charts. Select any currency pair and date range to see historical exchange rate patterns.
